actions.name: CreateEvent
actions.description: Grants permission to create a BugBust event

actions.name: EvaluateProfilingGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to evaluate checked-in profiling groups

actions.name: GetEvent
actions.description: Grants permission to view customer details about an event

actions.name: GetJoinEventStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to view the status of a BugBust player's attempt to join a BugBust event

actions.name: JoinEvent
actions.description: Grants permission to join an event

actions.name: ListBugs
actions.description: Grants permission to view the bugs that were imported into an event for players to work on

actions.name: ListEventParticipants
actions.description: Grants permission to view the participants of an event

actions.name: ListEventScores
actions.description: Grants permission to view the scores of an event's players

actions.name: ListEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to List BugBust events

actions.name: ListProfilingGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to view the profiling groups that were imported into an event for players to work on

actions.name: ListPullRequests
actions.description: Grants permission to view the pull requests used by players to submit fixes to their claimed bugs in an event

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to lists tag for a Bugbust resource

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a Bugbust resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag a Bugbust resource

actions.name: UpdateEvent
actions.description: Grants permission to update a BugBust event
dependentActions: codeguru-profiler:DescribeProfilingGroup                                                                                        codeguru-profiler:ListProfilingGroups                                                                                        codeguru-reviewer:DescribeCodeReview                                                                                        codeguru-reviewer:ListCodeReviews                                                                                        codeguru-reviewer:ListRecommendations                                                                                        codeguru-reviewer:TagResource                                                                                        codeguru-reviewer:UnTagResource

actions.name: UpdateWorkItem
actions.description: Grants permission to update a work item as claimed or unclaimed (bug or profiling group)

actions.name: UpdateWorkItemAdmin
actions.description: Grants permission to update an event's work item (bug or profiling group)
